titleStmt.title: A call to the churches; or, A packet of letters to the pastors of Wales presented to the baptized teachers there. With a postscript of a Welsh dispute. By Will. Erbery.
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 19 1652"; the "3" in the imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
